tag_list: janiesch, economist, business-school, hotel, online-travel, hospitality
overview:
Tobias Janiesch is a native of Muenster, Germany and was a member of SiteMinder’s senior management team in Sydney, Australia and one of the first five employees. In 2012 he moved to London to head up the operations of SiteMinder Europe as a General Manager.

In February 2011 Tobias joined Groupon in Berlin as a Senior Product Manager to lead the international expansion of Groupon. He is now leading the renewal of Groupon internationally as a Director Product Management.

Tobias Janiesch studied Business Administration and Economics in Germany, Spain and the United States. He is holding a degree in Master of Science in Economics from the University Muenster Business School, Muenster, Germany and a Certificate in Strategic Hospitality Management from the Cornell University’s Johnson Graduate School & School of Hotel Administration, Ithaca, New York. He is a certified Project Management Professional (PMP) since July 2010.
